Description.Title: ShootNumber model
Description.Abstract: calculate the shoot number and update the related variables if needed

Input.description: store the amount of new tiller created at each time a new tiller appears
Input.name: tilleringProfile_t1

Input.description: shoot number for the whole canopy
Input.name: canopyShootNumber_t1

Input.description: store the number of tiller for each leaf layer
Input.name: leafTillerNumberArray_t1

Input.description: max value of shoot number for the canopy
Input.name: targetFertileShoot

Output.description: average shoot number per plant in the canopy
Output.name: averageShootNumberPerPlant

Output.description: shoot number for the whole canopy
Output.name: canopyShootNumber

Output.description: store the number of tiller for each leaf layer
Output.name: leafTillerNumberArray

Output.description: store the amount of new tiller created at each time a new tiller appears
Output.name: tilleringProfile
